ValidationRule.description: If the Tech Pubs record Type is selected, Sub-class MUST equal Publications OR Web Technical Publications.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
(Case_Record_Type__c = 'Tech Pubs') &&
( ISPICKVAL( Type , 'Publications') ) &&
not (ISPICKVAL(Sub_Class__c, 'Publications') ) &&
NOT( ISPICKVAL(Sub_Class__c, 'Web Technical Publications') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select 'Publications' OR 'Web Technical Publications' for Sub Class
